title: Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 12
description:
Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 12:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Bang et al - Commercial Sexual Exploitation of Children (2014)

-  Betrayal; the Crisis in the Catholic Church (2002)

-  Brewis & Linstead - Sex, Work and Sex Work; Eroticizing Organization (2000)

-  Burg - Boys at Sea; Sodomy, Indecency, and Courts Martial in Nelson's Navy (2007)

-  Clancy - The Trauma Myth; the Truth About Sexual Abuse of Children - and Its Aftermath (2009)

-  Craig et al - Assessing Risk in Sex Offenders; a Practitioner's Guide (2008)

-  Diderot - The Nun (1796, 2005)

-  Dunn - Stolen Women in Medieval England; Rape, Abduction and Adultery, 1100-1500 (2013)

-  Ewing - Justice Perverted; Sex Offense Law, Psychology, and Public Policy (2011)

-  Fagan - Sexual Disorders; Perspectives on Diagnosis and Treatment (2004)

-  Florence - Sex at Work; Attraction, Orientation, Harassment, Flirtation and Discrimination (2004)

-  Ford - What Daddy Did; the Shocking True Story of a Little Girl Betrayed (2008)

-  Heffernan - The Naked Truth; a Working Woman's Manifesto on Business and What Really Matters (2004)

-  Horvath & Woodhams (Eds.) - Handbook on the Study of Multiple Perpetrator Rape (2013)

-  HRW - Capitol Offense; Police Mishandling of Sexual Assault Cases in the District of Columbia (2013)

-  HRW - Detained and at Risk; Sexual Abuse and Harassment in US Immigration Detention (2010)

-  Jackowski - The Silence We Keep; a Nun's View of the Catholic Priest Scandal (2004)

-  Johnson & Donaldson - A House Divided; Recovering from Sexual Abuse and Multiplicity (2013)

-  Jordheim - Made in the USA; the Sex Trafficking of America's Children (2014)

-  Kilday - A History of Infanticide in Britain, c. 1600 to the Present (2013)

-  Klein & Roberts (Eds.) - Sex Hormones and Immunity to Infection (2010)

-  Lalumiere et al - The Causes of Rape; Understanding Individual Differences in Male Propensity for Sexual Aggression (2005)

-  Morrison et al (Eds.) - Sexual Offending Against Children; Assessment and Treatment of Male Abusers (1994)

-  Muntarbhorn - Article 34; Sexual Exploitation and Sexual Abuse of Children (2007)

-  O'Donohue (Ed.) - Case Studies in Sexual Deviance; Toward Evidence Based Practice (2014)

-  Ream - Lived Through This; Listening to the Stories of Sexual Violence Survivors (2014)

-  Rich - Understanding, Assessing, and Rehabilitating Juvenile Sexual Offenders, 2e (2011)

-  Rigert - An Irish Tragedy; How Sex Abuse by Irish Priests Helped Cripple the Catholic Church (2008)

-  Ristock - No More Secrets; Violence in Lesbian Relationships (2002)

-  Saunders - Sexual Abuse Survivor's Handbook; One Man Fights the Catholic Church (2013)

-  Sheldon & Howitt - Sex Offenders and the Internet (2007)

-  Sielke - Reading Rape; the Rhetoric of Sexual Violence in American Literature and Culture, 1790-1990 (2002)

-  Smyth - Prison Rape; Law, Media, and Meaning (2011)

-  Ward et al - Theories of Sexual Offending (2006)

-  Wertheimer - Consent to Sexual Relations (2003)
